"Glasgow Coma Scale: GCS Score, Consciousness Level" is a simple and handy application to evaluate the patient's level of consciousness in an emergency setting. Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS score) is also used widely to assess the severity of a traumatic head injury. Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS score) is composed of three tests, namely eye, verbal, and motor response. The highest possible GCS score is 15 (E4V5M6), while the lowest is 3 (E1V1M1).

Why should you choose "Glasgow Coma Scale: GCS Score, Consciousness Level"?
- Simple and very easy to use.
- Simply choose between standard GCS score or pediatric GCS score feature.
- Interpretation of the GCS score (traumatic head injury severity).
- Useful for the health professional in an emergency setting.
- It is totally free. Download now!

"Glasgow Coma Scale: GCS Score, Consciousness Level" allows user to choose between standard GCS score or pediatric GCS score. There are slight differences between standard and pediatric GCS, especially on the verbal component. After that, the user needs to choose between several options for the best eye, verbal, and motor response. "Glasgow Coma Scale: GCS Score, Consciousness Level" will then show the result and conclusion of the possible traumatic head injury severity. There are three conclusions, namely minor, moderate, and severe head injury.

Disclaimer: all calculations must be re-checked and should not be used alone to guide patient care, nor should they substitute for clinical judgment. Calculations in this "Glasgow Coma Scale: GCS Score, Consciousness Level" app might be different with your local practice. Consult to expert doctor whenever necessary.

• Diet & Nutrition: get tips on what to eat, and what not to eat during pregnancy.
• Baby names: know the meaning and origin of the most popular names before making your choice.
• Weight Tracker: Track your body weight. Perform your weighing every week, and verify that you are within the normal range, according to your weight and height before becoming pregnant.
• Contractions Tracker: At the end of the pregnancy you will begin to feel contractions. It is very important to record the duration of contractions and the pauses between them, to know if it is time to go to the hospital.
• Kicks Counter: Your baby's movements could provide information about your baby's health. If there are problems, your baby may move less or not at all. Recording these movements is crucial to see the doctor immediately when noticing any abnormality.

summary.label:
Suffering from IBS? The Low FODMAP Diet can help relief your symptoms and be free of IBS for good. Low FODMAP Lifestyle is the easiest way to look up which foods are high FODMAP and low FODMAP.

This app is build by Lifeplano and we know what IBS and the low FODMAP diet is about, because one of our founders have followed it himself. It is a very restrictive diet and therefore harder to follow, but we have made it so much easier with Low FODMAP Lifestyle.

*Functionalities*
- Low FODMAP food list
- Personal testing of every food
- More than 40+ recipes
- Basic knowledge about IBS and FODMAPs

*What is IBS - Irritable Bowel Syndrome?*
IBS is a condition where your gut have trouble digesting foods with certain carbohydrates: Oligosaccharides, Disaccharides, Mannitols and Polyols. Which carbohydrates you react too can be different from others, as the amount also can, which is why it is a very personal diet.

It is estimated by scientists at the Australian Monash University that 1 in 7 suffers from IBS and it is a lifestyle condition mainly present in western countries.

*What is the Low FODMAP Diet?*
Monash University are also the inventors of the Low FODMAP Diet. It is a diet that helps you find out exactly what carbohydrates and foods your gut reacts to and in what amount, so you can limit or exclude that from your diet going forward.

The IBS diet consist of three phases:
- Phase 1: The eliminations phase - Here you eliminate FODMAPs from your diet until you are symptom free.
- Phase 2: The reintroduction phase - Here you slowly reintroduce the different carbohydrates, and test which ones cause reactions.
- Phase 3: The personal diet phase - You now have a personal diet, but IBS can develop over time, so you need to retest foods again to see if your tolerance changed.

With our app you can also test new foods and drinks that haven't been tested yet and see if you tolerate it. Examples could be a can of Pepsi or ketchup which are both processed groceries with unknown levels of FODMAPs.

The diet can seem very restrictive if you are new to it, and it is proved that restrictive diets are the hardest to follow. With Low FODMAP Lifestyle we have made the diet more available so it seems easier to follow and less restrictive. Follow our low FODMAP recipes, get symptom free and test new foods every week, to make your personal diet and low FODMAP food list.

The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

title.label: Menstrual Cycle Tracker - Anastasia Kovba

summary.label:
A Spinal Surgery Table with Advanced Patient Positioning

The ProAxis® Spinal Surgery Table is the first of its kind, designed to support the biomechanical aspects of spine and imaging procedures while expanding on the key benefits of the original Spinal Table System. The table’s software-driven hinge technology allows for flexion and extension of the spine, providing direct visualization of intraoperative changes in spinal alignment. This capability facilitates controlled closure for lumbar osteotomies and spinal canal decompressions. The table’s hand pendant, called the IntelliPendant®, provides real-time information of the table’s position, clear selection of the table’s functions, and the ability to store two memory positions.

The table’s radiolucent hinge allows for anterior, posterior, lateral and oblique views intraoperatively without interference at the surgical site. The ProAxis Table easily converts from an open frame design to a supine top, allowing it to support prone, supine and lateral positioning. This versatility makes ProAxis an ideal platform for a variety of procedures including pedicle subtraction osteotomies (PSOs), spinal fusions (lateral, posterior, anterior, transforaminal), laminectomies, and lumbar total discs.
 This application provides simplified table setup instructions for various procedures on the ProAxis Table. It includes visual references, standard component installation instructions, table features, procedure setup instructions, storage and components, and optional accessories for the device. Users must read and understand the ProAxis Spinal Surgery Table Owner’s Manual before using the device.   This material is intended for healthcare professionals only. If you are not a healthcare professional, please consult your doctor for additional information regarding use of this product.

title.label: ProAxis Setups - Mizuho OSI
